trends: There have been no other sightings in Hopkinton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was my morning routine to go out on my deck over looking the Lake and have mymorning coffee. Before exiting the sliding glass doors I noticed a reflectionon the lake just like if the moon was full thats when I looked up and saw whatI thought was a large star but it seemed to be very low. My first instinct wasto get my camera but for some strange reason I couldnt. I sat down and watchedit mezmerizesd. I was very aware of my surroundings but just really couldntfocus on anything else. I did look to the left and saw a 34 moon in the treesand also I think what was the North star, but this was nothing like that.While I was watching I thought to myself if this moves then I will really befrightened. Then it slowly moved in my dierction over the house and it soundedlike a far away jet engine.When it left I sat there about 2 minutes in awe. My first instinct was to tellsomebody. Nobody around at that time of the morning people were still sleeping. I went to the internet and looked up UFO and found this Web page.Before this I didnt believe in UFos and Im having a hard time thinking aboutanything else and I really dont understand why I didnt get up and takepictures.I also thought about reporting it to the police but was afraid of themnot believing me and looking ridiculous. I am willing to take a lie detectortest and to be hypnotized.I find myself hoping opssesively for it to come back or to find someone else whowitnessed the same thing or some explanation to what I saw.My only regret is that it was there for a long enough time that I could havetaken alot of pictures but the fact that I didnt will haunt me for the rest ofmy life.
